card_pen_effect: You can target 1 "Performapal" or "Odd-Eyes" card in your GY; add it to your hand, then destroy this card. You can only use this effect of "Performapal Odd-Eyes Seer" once per turn.
card_text: During your Main Phase, if you control this Pendulum Summoned card: You can activate the following effect, based on its battle position;$N●Attack Position: You can banish this card, then target 1 "Performapal" or "Odd-Eyes" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.$N●Defense Position: Take 1 "Performapal" or "Odd-Eyes" Pendulum Monster from your Deck, and either add it to your face-up Extra Deck or send it to the GY.$NYou can only use this effect of "Performapal Odd-Eyes Seer" once per turn.
